value.name: Crime lab report shows path of bullets in John Albers shooting
value.description: A crime lab report from the Johnson County Sheriff's Office describes the path of bullets that an Overland Park police officer fired at John Albers. The report was obtained by Albers' mother, Sheila Albers,

value.name: ‘Not a good shoot’: Experts criticize Overland Park police shooting of John Albers
value.description: Experts who reviewed the investigation for The Star found it lacked key information and was tilted in favor of the police officer.

value.name: State regulators don't act on complaint against Overland Park police chief
value.description: State regulators have decided not to act against the certification of Overland Park, Kansas Police Chief Frank Donchez following a complaint by John Albers' mother. She claimed the police chief lied about the dismissal of Officer Clayton Jennison.
